channel.title: Research on Spencer Barrett
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Spencer Barrett

item.title: Current Research
item.description: Research Projects in the SCH Barrett Lab Here is some of the research currently being undertaken in the Barrett lab with background and the particular projects that I have funding to support. Students or PDFs that are interested in these topics and who would like to work in my lab should contact me by e-mail.

item.title: Publications Record
item.description: Historical List of Publications Scientific Publications of Spencer C. H. Barrett. Copyright notice: The PDF’s below are provided for the dissemination of scholarly research only. The copyrights are retained by the authors and/or publishers and anyone downloading the pdfs is expected to obey the legal requirements imposed by copyright law, and may not repost them without explicit permission from the copyright holder. [1975] Pickersgill, B.P., Barrett, S.
